DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of this study are to evaluate the performance of the Medrobotics Flex® Robotic System to visualize and access specific anatomical locations along with evaluation of the safety of the device.
DOC.brief_title: A Post-Market Clinical Trial for Access and Visualization of the Oropharynx, Hypopharynx and Larynx During Transoral Procedures
DOC.criteria: ≥ 22 years of age Candidate for transoral surgery in the oropharynx, hypopharynx and larynx Less than 22 years of age Not a candidate for transoral surgery in the oropharynx, hypopharynx and larynx
